Question: Lifeworks Technology Group, LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lifeworks Technology Group, LLC

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Abode Edge Camera with Wi-Fi HaLow system for over a mile of wireless range, object detection, and face recognition, available for $199 with a six-month battery life.
- Eureka Dual Washing Bot, a combination of washer, dryer, robot vacuum, and robot mop in one device, currently available in China.
- Apostrophy OS, a new mobile operating system offering a privacy-focused alternative to Android, available on the MC02 smartphone for $750, with a $15 monthly subscription after the first year.
- Clicks, a case that adds a physical QWERTY keyboard to the iPhone, available for select models starting at $139.
- LG CineBeam Qube, a compact 4K projector with a 360-degree rotating handle, no price yet.
- Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 5 Hybrid, a Windows laptop with a detachable display that turns into an Android 13 tablet, expected to cost around $2,000 and go on sale in the second quarter of the year.
- Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro with DockKit, a MagSafe charger for the iPhone that doubles as a 360-degree swiveling tripod, priced at $180.
